Sentencas: Purpose A reliability analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system is presented for applications with strict constant power supply requirements, such as data centers.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: The purpose is to demonstrate the effect when moving from a module-level to a system-level in terms of reliability, also considering effects during start-up and degradation.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: Design/methodology/approach In-house experimental data on a system-level are used to capture the behavior during start-up and normal operation, including drifts of the operation point due to degradation.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: The system is assumed to allow replacement of stacks during operation, but a minimum number of stacks in operation is needed to avoid complete shutdown.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: Experimental data are used in conjunction with a physics-based performance model to construct the failure probability function.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: A dynamic program then solves the optimization problem in terms of time and replacement requirements to minimize the total negative deviation from a given target reliability.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: Findings Results show that multi-stack SOFC systems face challenges which are only revealed on a system- and not on a module-level.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: The main finding is that the reliability of multi-stack SOFC systems is not sufficient to serve as sole power source for critical applications such as data center.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: Practical implications The principal methodology may be applicable to other modular systems which include multiple critical components (of the same kind).
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: These systems comprise other electrochemical systems such as further fuel cell types.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: Originality/value The novelty of this work is the combination of mathematical modeling to solve a real-world problem, rather than assuming idealized input which lead to more benign system conditions.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: Furthermore, the necessity to use a mathematical model, which captures sufficient physics of the SOFC system as well as stochasticity elements of its environment, is of critical importance.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation

Sentencas: Some simplifications are, however, necessary because the use of a detailed model directly in the dynamic program would have led to a combinatorial explosion of the numerical solution space.
Titulo: Reliability analysis for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell system subject to operation condition-dependent degradation
